title: Gemini Lover is a spambot
body: Accepted a friend request from this user, instantly got this message even though the account was offline. Lolking says it is a level one account with no match history

replies.body: Same happened to me, just now.
Does this mean we're brothers? O:
Thanks dude, we'll take care of it

"Reporting Other Players

Please don't name names. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We'll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly."

~http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules

> "If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules,"

But this isn't about a person, it's about a spambot.

I was just quoting the [Universal Rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) page. If you have a problem with it, bring it up with a red.

Basically, make a ticket if you can't use the in-build report system. Don't come to the boards and name names, even if it is a bot. It will just cause chaos and witch-hunting along the lines of 4chan.

Ok maybe not that drastic but the point of the rule is to prevent us from reaching that.
Happened to me yesterday. Thanks riot :)
